cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)
mng: to knock against, to bump into, to run into, to meet by accident

exm.mng: to collide, jerking motion, to impinge, to offend, to provoke
to strike, to hit, to ram
to crash (into another car), (fig.) (of opinions, schedules etc) to clash, (of subject matter) to be the same
to knock down and kill sb with a car, to run over sb, to run sb down
collision, crash, to crash together, to collide with, to bump into
